static int edu.ou.asgbook.projections.Remapper.bilinearInterpolation ( double  rowno,
double  colno,
int  input[][],
int  missing 
) [static] 

00026                                                                                                    {
00027         final int row0 = (int) Math.floor( rowno );
00028         final int col0 = (int) Math.floor( colno );
00029         final int row1 = (int) Math.ceil( rowno );
00030         final int col1 = (int) Math.ceil( colno );
00031         final int nrows = input.length;
00032         final int ncols = (nrows > 0)? input[0].length : 0;
00033         
00034         int npts = 0;
00035         double totwt = 0;
00036         double totval = 0;
00037         for (int row = row0; row <= row1; ++row){
00038             for (int col = col0; col <= col1; ++col){
00039                 if ( row >= 0 && col >= 0 && row < nrows && col < ncols && input[row][col] != missing ){
00040                     double rowwt = 1 - Math.abs(rowno-row);
00041                     double colwt = 1 - Math.abs(colno-col);
00042                     double wt = rowwt * colwt;
00043                     npts++;
00044                     totwt += wt;
00045                     totval += wt * input[row][col];
00046                 }
00047             }
00048         }
00049         
00050         // weighted average
00051         if (npts == 0){
00052             return missing;
00053         } else {
00054             return (int) Math.round(totval / totwt);
00055         }
00056     }
